sources.title: Kitty Caddy (1947)
sources.description: In this Columbia "Color Phantasy" cartoon (production number 9701), it's the dogs vs. the cats in a golf match. But halfway through the match, an animated, unnamed version of Bob Hope and Bing Crosby join the competition. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/kitty-caddy-1947/

metadata.Plot: In this Columbia "Color Phantasy" cartoon (production number 9701), it's the dogs vs. the cats in a golf match. But halfway through the match, an animated, unnamed version of Bob Hope and Bing Crosby join the competition.
